basic_flat_buffer::consume

Remove bytes from the input sequence.

Synopsis 
void
consume(
    std::size_t n);
Description

If n is greater than the number of bytes in the input sequence, all bytes in the input sequence are removed.

Remarks

All previous buffers sequences obtained from calls to basic_flat_buffer::data or basic_flat_buffer::prepare are invalidated.
